casebody.data:
THE GAYLORD MANUFACTURING COMPANY, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. SARAH O. ALLEN, Administratrix, etc., Defendant and Appellant.

Before Barbour, Ch. J., Curtis, and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided April 5, 1873. Appeal from a judgment entered on the report of a referee, in favor of plaintiff, in an action on an account of merchandise sold and delivered. John L. Cadwalader, for appellant. John L. Hill, for respondent. Judgment affirmed.

Opinion "by Barbour, Ch. J. Curtis and Sedgwick, JJ., concurred.
